document.title: FSFE's statement on the project on "IP and competition policy" at WIPO CDIP/6
document.description: Statement to the 2010 WIPO 6th session of the Committee on Development and Intellectual Property (CDIP), November 22, 2010 to November 26, 2010. (Note: Originally published on the weblog of FSFE president Karsten Gerloff)
